data.system_settings: iPhone XS Max, iOS 12.1.1 Dev Beta 3
data.expected_result: Channels are all displayed at the same time
data.short_description: [iPhone X/XR/XS/XS Max] Channels in closed categories open one-by-one when you close and reopen them
data.steps_to_repro: - Note: this works with the iOS category in the Discord Testers server - Open a channel category at the bottom of the channel list - Ensure that you are scrolled to the bottom of the channel list - Close the category to ensure that there is blank space stuck at the bottom - Reopen the category
